about_the_game:
Survive. Upgrade. Dominate.

Step into the unforgiving frontier of Wicked West, a relentless top-down shoot 'em up survival game set in a twisted version of the Wild West. It’s you against hordes of ruthless enemies in a lawless land where the only rule is kill or be killed. Armed with nothing but grit and your trusty gun, you'll need quick reflexes and strategic thinking to last as long as possible.

Features

  • One Life, Sudden Death
    Death is permanent in Wicked West. Outdraw, outgun, and outsmart your foes to stay alive in this high-stakes survival rogue-like experience.

  • Dynamic Progression System
    Earn experience by racking up kills and claiming victory over waves of enemies. Level up to unlock powerful upgrades, new weapons, and devastating abilities to take on increasingly dangerous waves.

  • Epic Boss Battles
    Face off against fearsome Wild West bosses, each with unique attack patterns and challenges that will test your skills to the limit.

  • Variety of Enemy Types
    From bandits to Cowboys, Rifleman and more; every encounter is a deadly dance where one wrong move can end your run.

  • Survival ModeYour core experience. Survive against waves of enemies. How long can you last? And what is the highest score you can achieve!

Are You Ready to Take your Shot?

Grab your revolver, saddle up, and show the Wicked West what you're made of. Survive the chaos, grow stronger with every kill, and carve your name into legend.

content_descriptors.notes: Set int he wild west you will be killing many different people, with each kill creating persistent blood splatter on the game world. Excessive and unrealistic gore throughout so this may not be suitable for everyone.

name: Wicked West

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Survive the unforgiving frontier in Wicked West, a top-down shoot 'em up where every kill earns upgrades and new abilities. Face relentless enemies, epic bosses, and one-shot death in this brutal Wild West survival challenge. Can you outlast the chaos?
